timeline.message: first (simplified) verison of the random assignment
add test and fix errors in random generation algorithm
Delete existing student exams on re-generate
Check that all exercise groups have an exam
Ensure that numberOfExercisesInExam is equal to the actual number of exercises added to all generated student exams

timeline.bodyText: I like that you explicitly assign this, it helps with understanding what you are doing here. I would suggest to copy the whole array instead of just referencing it. This way no one will use a modified mandatoryIndices in the future.
timeline.author: JonasPetry

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the comment! I've applied it here: c1b337e
replies.author: sascha11110

timeline.bodyText: Do we really need this to be a long?
timeline.author: JonasPetry

replies.bodyText:
stream.count() returns a long, and I did not want to cast this to an int.
I don't think it makes a difference
replies.author: krusche

replies.bodyText: The implementation of count() for Java streams returns a long :-)
replies.author: sascha11110

timeline.bodyText: Please clarify why you sort the indices.
timeline.author: JonasPetry
